Submodules¶

common.decorators module¶

class common.decorators.Log(func)¶

Bases: object

The decorator that logs function calls. Stores events of type debug containing information about the name of the function called, the parameters with which the function called, and the module that called the function.

common.decorators.login_required(func)¶

The decorator that checks that the client authorized on the server. Verifies that the socket object passed in the list of authorized clients. Except for the transmission of a dictionary-request for authorization. If the client not authorized, throws a TypeError exception.

common.descriptor module¶

class common.descriptor.Port¶

Bases: object

A handle to the port number. Allows only ports 1023 to 65536. Trying to set an invalid port number throws an exception.

common.errors module¶

exception common.errors.ServerError(text)¶

Bases: Exception

Exception class for handling server errors. When generated, it requires a string with a description of the error received from the server.

common.meta module¶

class common.meta.ClientMeta(clsname, bases, clsdict)¶

Bases: type

A metaclass that checks that the resulting class does not contain client calls such as: connect. It also checks that the server socket TCP and works over IPv4 protocol.

class common.meta.ServerMeta(clsname, bases, clsdict)¶

Bases: type

A metaclass that checks that the resulting class does not contain server calls such as: accept, listen. It also checks that the socket not created inside the class constructor.

common.utils module¶

common.variables module¶
